thread.title: This Picture Of Mariah Carey Leaving A Weed Dispensary Is Everything, Darling, Everything
thread.title_full: This Picture Of Mariah Carey Leaving A Weed Dispensary Is Everything, Darling, Everything

author: Matt Stopera
title: This Picture Of Mariah Carey Leaving A Weed Dispensary Is Everything, Darling, Everything
text:
View this image ›
instagram.com ID: 10260467 1. You know, keeping it casual with enormous Christmas trees, rhinestone bustiers, a blowout, and a simple plaid shirt. LuAnn de Lesseps was wrong, money CAN buy you class. View this image ›
instagram.com ID: 10260475 2. Well, because weed is legal in Colorado now and because why the hell not, Mariah was spotted leaving a weed dispensary. But this wasn’t just any normal trip to a weed dispensary, this was a Mariah Carey trip to a weed dispensary. We’re talking gowns, people. GOWNS. View this image ›
blingee.com ID: 10260565 3. Ladies and gentleman, in all her Mariah Carey glory, here’s what Mariah Carey looked like leaving a weed dispensary View this image ›
AKM-GSI ID: 10260406 4. Notice the festive gloves. Santa Claus is seething. View this image ›
Alma, Fafl / AKM-GSI ID: 10260413 5. The gown. THE GOWWWWN!!! View this image ›
Alma, Fafl / AKM-GSI ID: 10260648 6. The mermaid cut of said gown. The white guy with dreads who sold her the weed is gagging!!! View this image ›
Alma, Fafl / AKM-GSI ID: 10260652 7. Lastly, her smile. She is beaming like someone who might be ready to get a little high! Ah, the legal weed life! View this image ›
Alma, Fafl / AKM-GSI ID: 10260416 8. In conclusion, live everyday like Mariah Carey leaving a weed dispensary in a gown. View this image ›
Alma, Fafl / AKM-GSI ID: 10260668 9. Be the the 420 goddess you are meant to be. View this image ›
Alma, Fafl / AKM-GSI ID: 10260731 10. Xoxo. ID: 10260834 Mariah Carey
